channel.title: Killed as king when i had guards by a merc
channel.description:
#### What happened? I were killed by a merc as a king when I had guards on myself. There were no enforcer/reaper/any natural killer in the game. only assasian and a merc. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The guards should have made me immune
If mercs can bypass death immunity, at least write it on the class description

item.title: Killed as king when i had guards by a merc

item.description:
It used to in the alpha or beta?I can’t remember I just know I saw it in a video.

Read full topic

item.title: Killed as king when i had guards by a merc
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
What happened?

I were killed by a merc as a king when I had guards on myself.
There were no enforcer/reaper/any natural killer in the game. only assasian and a merc.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The guards should have made me immune

If mercs can bypass death immunity, at least write it on the class description

Read full topic
item.source: Killed as king when i had guards by a merc
